sentences.sContent: Mary Shelley was just 18 when she wrote the horror masterpiece ‘Frankenstein’.
sentences.sCn: 玛丽•雪莱创作《科学怪人》这部恐怖小说名作的时候年仅18岁。

remMethod.val: master(大师) ＋ piece(篇章) → 杰作

trans.tranOther: a work of art, a piece of writing or music etc that is of very high quality or that is the best that a particular artist, writer etc has produced
